carpet.rule.armorStandIgnoreShulkerDamag: If enable, MobProjectile will not hurt ArmorStand.
carpet.rule.leadBandBeeDisable.name: ShulkerBullet can't hurt ArmorStand
carpet.rule.leadBandBeeDisable.desc: If enable, MobProjectile will not hurt ArmorStand.
carpet.rule.brittleDeepSlate.name: Brittledeepslate
carpet.rule.brittleDeepSlate.desc: If enable,deepSlate's hardness will be change to 1.6.
carpet.rule.tickRateChangedMessage.name: Message for game speed changes
carpet.rule.tickRateChangedMessage.desc: If enable,players will be allowed to leave messages when the game speed changes.
carpet.rule.easyFakePeace.name: Simple fakepeace switch
carpet.rule.easyFakePeace.desc: If enable,players will be allowed to manipulate the fakepeace switch via/fakepeace command.
carpet.rule.itempickupDelay.name: Pickup delay for discarded items
carpet.rule.itempickupDelay.desc: If this option is changed, the pickup delay of the item entity thrown by the player will be set to this option value, set to 32767 to disable item pickup.
carpet.rule.easyCommand.name: easy command
carpet.rule.tntTeleportThroughNetherPort: If enable,Primed TNT can teleport through a nether portal
carpet.rule.disableNetherPortal.name: Disable Nether Portal
carpet.rule.disableNetherPortal.desc: If enable,Entity can not teleport through a nether portal
carpet.rule.netherPortalCooldown.name: NetherPortalCooldown
carpet.rule.netherPortalCooldown.desc: If this option is changed, the cooldown of the NetherPortal the player will be set to this option
carpet.rule.fireworkParticleNumber.desc: 小型烟花的爆炸粒子数
carpet.rule.fireworkParticleNumber.name: 小型烟花的爆炸粒子数
carpet.rule.fireworkRange.name: 小型烟花的爆炸范围
carpet.rule.bigfireworkRange.name: 大型烟花的爆炸范围
carpet.rule.bigfireworkParticleNumber.de: 大型烟花的爆炸粒子数
carpet.rule.bigfireworkParticleNumber.na: 大型烟花的爆炸粒子数
carpet.rule.endGatewayTicket.name: EndGateway Load
carpet.rule.endGatewayTicket.desc: If enable,When the gateway is teleported,add a 3x3 loading area
carpet.rule.babyZombieOdds.name: Baby Zombie Spawn Chance
carpet.rule.babyZombieOdds.desc: Adjust the probability of baby zombies spawning
In vanilla, baby zombies have a 5% chance to spawn as chicken jockeys on nearby chickens (fails if no chicken nearby), and an additional 4.75% (0.95×0.05) chance to spawn with a chicken. If changed, this will disable jockey spawning on existing chickens and directly use the configured chance for chicken-accompanied spawning. Note: Actual probability = Baby Zombie Chance × Chicken Jockey Chance
carpet.rule.projectileRaycastLength.name: Projectile raycast length maximums
carpet.rule.pearlTicketoptimization.name: Projectile raycast length maximums
carpet.command.resetTick: The game speed has been reset
